#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline long long inp()
    {
    long long noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
    while(p>32)
    {
    noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
    p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
    };
int main()
{
    int t,n,i;
    long long max,sum,avg;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        long long candy[n];
        candy[0]=inp();
        sum=candy[0];
        max=candy[0];
        avg=candy[0];
        for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            candy[i]=inp();
            sum+=candy[i];
            avg=sum/(i+1);
            if(max>avg)
                max=avg;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",max);
    }
    return 0;
}
